name: booxl
tag_list: ebooks, ebook, ebook-subscription, ebook-subscription-service, digital-library, free-ebooks, ebooks-online, read-ebooks-online, browse-and-stream-millions-of-ebooks, ebook-streaming
overview:
booxl is a broad ebook subscription service, allowing readers to access millions of ebooks through their mobile and tablet devices as well as on the web.

Instead of paying per download, readers can join with a free or paid subscription service and enjoy access to booxl’s expansive digital library.
